dn1:1.11.2: seyyathidaṁ → seyyathīdaṁ (bj, sya-all, pts1ed) | pañcamaṁ → pañcamaṁ iti vā (bj, sya-all, mr)
dn1:1.13.2: meṇḍayuddhaṁ → meṇḍakayuddhaṁ (pts1ed) | sobhanakaṁ → sobhanagarakaṁ (sya-all, km, pts1ed) | mahiṁsayuddhaṁ → mahisayuddhaṁ (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed) | kumbhathūṇaṁ → kumbhathūnaṁ (bj, sya-all, mr) | dhovanaṁ → dhopanaṁ (pts1ed)
dn1:1.15.2: hatthattharaṁ assattharaṁ rathattharaṁ → hatthattharaṇaṁ assattharaṇaṁ rathattharaṇaṁ (pts1ed, mr)
dn1:1.16.2: daṇḍaṁ → daṇḍakaṁ (bj, pts1ed) | nāḷikaṁ → nālikaṁ (sya-all) | asiṁ → asiṁ khaggaṁ (sya-all, km); khaggaṁ (pts1ed)
dn1:1.17.2: itthikathaṁ → itthīkathaṁ (bj); itthikathaṁ purisakathaṁ (cck, km, mr); itthīkathaṁ purisakathaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
dn1:1.20.1: lābhena lābhaṁ nijigīsitāro ca → lābhena ca lābhaṁ nijigiṁsitāro (bj, sya-all, pts1ed)
dn1:1.24.2: sūriyaggāho → suriyaggāho (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed) | devadudrabhi → devadundubhi (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed)
dn1:2.27.19: hoti ca na ca hoti → hoti ca na hoti ca (bj, pts1ed, mr)
